document.full_text: the university of arizona? university of colorado, boulder? the university of oregon? kori hazel, a high school senior from denver, makes his choice after realizing it is not "the most important'' decision in his life, only "the next phase."
document.title: from a stranger in an airport, a decision becomes clear
